definition: erhua variant of 蟈蟈|蝈蝈[guo1 guo5]
small green cicada or frog (meaning unclear, possibly onom.)/see 蟈蟈|蝈蝈 long-horned grasshopper
small green cicada or frog (meaning unclear, possibly onom.)/see 蟈蟈|蝈蝈 long-horned grasshopper

sentences.english: And eh grasshopper laughs in the merry scene.
sentences.chinese: 歡笑的蟈蟈兒不會在熱鬧裏打瞌睡。
